answers.answer: That's really funny. My whole family is thinking my baby will come today. It's my second wedding anniversary and I'm 39+4. I'd definitely love to have her soon as I'm getting so uncomfortable, but I would also like to have this day for my husband and I. I'd like for her to have her own day, but honestly at this point I'm happy to have her whenever!  Happy birthday!
I heard there's Link between vitamin D and preeclampsia. It was in a newish study. Best of luck!

question: So today is my birthday and my whole family was joking that maybe my son would come for my birthday and I had a scare where my blood pressure was high so almost headed to the hospital but then it got normal so all is good for now. I had preeclampsia with my previous and yesterday my BP was high at my doctor's check up, so they told me if it got high to go in to l&d. But, everything under control. However I do hope my son comes soon. I'll be 37 eres in a couple hours!  :)
title: almost birthday surprise haha
